forum.content:
You are the one
who fills me up with colours,
Who burns the sky for me,
Boy, don’t you see,
Sun shines brighter when you are near…

But it’s like no one else on the earth,
Your smile, your touch, your lips,
The hopes I was thinking in,
Your love was given me…

urls.description: Just my love to share music with you brings me back a bit and hope you enjoy this great song - I lis
urls.title: Alex M O R P H feat. Natalie Gioia - My Heaven (Original Mix)

forum.title: The Beautiful Sound of Alex M.O.R.P.H
